name: pixcell
description:
This is a simulation of various cellular automatons, for now life rules and wireworld are implemented. Langton's ant coming in some time.

  • Left click to place cell
  • 1, 0 to place life ruleset cells (alive, dead)
  • 2, 3, 4 to place wireworld cells (head, tail, wire)
  • Spacebar to start and stop simulation
  • Q to proceed one step in simulation
  • H or hold both mouse buttons in one place to show or hide help panel
  • Drag camera with both mouse buttons pressed
  • Scroll wheel to zoom
  • R to reset board

Change ruleset of cells by using textbox on top of the help panel using `Survival/Birth` format for amounts of neighbors.
